_comment: EXAMPLE extraction file - Shows format for LLM to follow when extracting achievements

position_metadata.title: Team Leader, Sr. Dir., Commercial Clinical Strategy

achievements.text: Led customer data strategy transformation, implementing structured BI workflows that reduced custom data request turnaround time from 5 days to 24 hours while improving data accuracy by 35%

Designed and launched cross-functional sprint management process creating nexus for senior leadership collaboration, focusing 300+ hours per week of execution capacity on priority pharma client initiatives
Managed portfolio of ~30 strategic pharmaceutical deals annually totaling $30M+ in sales, achieving 92% renewal rate through consultative partnership approach
Standardized ROI projection methodology for pharma partnerships enabling consistent modeling of 60+ annual opportunities, reducing deal assessment time from 3 days to 4 hours
achievements.context: Created templates and training materials for commercial strategy team

achievements.text: Provided full-cycle campaign oversight from pitch through IQVIA impact analysis and optimization, partnering with top-tier pharma clients to refine targeting and media configuration strategies
Developed direct reports' analytics and strategic capabilities through weekly coaching sessions, resulting in 3 promotions within 18-month period
